Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at The Oriental Siam Resort in Chiang Mai (Tha Sala), you'll be convenient to Chiang Mai Promenada and Bangkok Hospital. This 4-star hotel is within close proximity of Chiengmai Gymkhana Club and Nong Hoi Market.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 14 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars and DVD players. Rooms have private balconies. LCD televisions with cable programming provide entertainment, while complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected. Private bathrooms with separate bathtubs and showers feature complimentary toiletries and hair dryers.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Be sure to enjoy recreational amenities including an outdoor pool and a fitness center. Additional amenities include complimentary wireless Internet access, babysitting/childcare (surcharge), and a hair salon. Getting to nearby attractions is a breeze with the complimentary area shuttle.

Dining
Grab a bite at one of the hotel's 2 restaurants, or stay in and take advantage of room service (during limited hours). A complimentary continental breakfast is served daily.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a computer station, express check-in, and dry cleaning/laundry services. A roundtrip airport shuttle is complimentary (available on request).
